## For Maintainers

- [ ] Template scope is appropriate (not too broad, not too narrow)
- [ ] No duplicate of existing or planned templates
- [ ] Technology is actively maintained and widely used
- [ ] Contributor is ready to implement (if applicable)
- [ ] Assigned to Phase 2 (Core Templates) milestone

**Priority**: 
- [ ] High - Popular technology with high demand
- [ ] Medium - Established technology with moderate demand  
- [ ] Low - Niche technology or role
